========================
BRIC general information
========================

.. meta::
   :description lang=en: Discover the labs at BRIC and find some information on how make the best of them.


Contact information
-----------------------------------

BRIC director: Stephen Hall

Research Administrator: Kathryn Callicott

you can otherinfo_

Please see `Title 2`_

Access to BRIC
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. figure:: /_static/bric_xlarge_2100102.jpg
   :width: 300px
   :align: right

   BRIC building

Address: Research Way, Plymouth Science Park, Plymouth, PL6 8BU

* By bus: Bus 51, stop at Miller way & Research way. 
* By car: A limited number of parking space is available. 
.. ADD MORE INFORMATION!

""""""""""""""""""

~~~~~~~~

.. seealso:: If you want to know more, check out our :doc:`/mri/mri` guide.

.. warning::

   We strongly recommend to ...


.. tip::

   Fantastic tip.


.. note::

   Useful note.

.. _otherinfo:

Other information
-------------------------------------------

Example insert of code1::

    $ pip install read-the-docs-template

.. parsed-literal::

    # parsed-literal test
    curl -O http://someurl/release-|version|.tar-gz

.. code-block:: python
   :linenos:
   :emphasize-lines: 3,5

   def some_function():
       interesting = False
       print 'This line is highlighted.'
       print 'This one is not...'
       print '...but this one is.'    

Links
~~~~~~~~

Example insert of link

- `BET <http://fsl.fmrib.ox.ac.uk/fsl/fslwiki/BET>`_ of `FSL
  <http://fsl.fmrib.ox.ac.uk/fsl/fslwiki/>`_
- `3dSkullStrip
  <http://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dSkullStrip.html>`_
  of `AFNI <http://afni.nimh.nih.gov/>`_
-  `FreeSurfer <https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/>`_

Some dedicated anonymization tools work on this principle, e.g. `DeID`_

Quick start video
-----------------

This screencast will help you get started or you can
:ref:`read our guide below <intro/getting-started-with-sphinx:Quick start>`.
